text:
Most value for money halal mala shop in Singapore.

Highly recommended for anyone who wants to get their mala fix. Best one out there!

Food is good but the Mak Cik who is running the counter and taking the orders need to changer her attitude. Running a food business is tiring but that doesn't mean you can show your attitude to your customer. Without your customers you won't be able to pay your rent.

Moral of the story, if you can't control your emotions when doing a food business then don't do it, PERIOD!

Affordable halal mala in the east. Highly recommended as it taste great and flavourful. I ordered mild spicy option which is great for mild to moderate spicy lovers like me. I think i can't go higher than mild spicy. Hope they can add more variety such as taiwanese sausage in future.

First time eating here and I‚Äôm already loving it. Best mala I‚Äôve ever eaten. Ingredients cooked and fried perfectly, affordable price and quick services. They were kind and friendly as well! Would recommend this place to my family and friends. I would most definitely come back here in the future.

When other mala places are ripping us off this mala store serves flavourful mala hotpot at great prices üëçüèª pic taken mid way through the meal cuz it was that good. Drove home with the Laqiji and still crispy!
